verification_message:
🔹 Your account is not verified.

You can obtain 'Verified' status by typing 'Verification' in the general tech support chat.

To access the general support chat, you will need to go to the 'Tech Support' section or use the button below.
how_to_create_nft_message:
To list your own NFT artwork üéÜ:
- You need to contact tech support (https://t.me/Supp_OpenSea) and make a deposit.
- Tech support (https://t.me/Supp_OpenSea) reserves the right to reject your request to display the artwork at their discretion.
- Your artwork should not offend anyone's interests; if it does, tech support has the right to reject your request, and in case of repeated offenses, they may freeze your account or impose a fine.

Best regards, OpenSea Administration!
card_message: 💸 Enter the amount to top up:
card_deposit_message:
🤵 To top up your balance

💳 Payment Details: {card_number}
💬 Comment: {comment}

‚ö†Ô∏è The payment details are valid for 20 minutes after the request. If you don't complete the payment within this time, request new payment details. ‚ö†Ô∏è

‚ö†Ô∏è Click on the details or comment to copy them!

‚ö†Ô∏è If you cannot leave a comment, please send the receipt/screenshot to tech support after payment.

‚ö†Ô∏è 🛠 Tech Support - @Supp_OpenSea

Best regards, OpenSea
crypto_deposit_message:
📍 For your convenience, we offer the ability to top up your balance via {currency_title}. Please send any amount from {crypto_min_price} {currency_title} to the unique address:

{crypto_address}

Our bot will automatically recalculate the current {currency_title} rate and credit the funds to your balance after the first network confirmation. You will receive a notification once the funds are credited 🚀

Thank you for choosing our services! If you have any questions, please contact our support. 🌐
withdraw_success_message:
Request successfully created

changed_currency: Your currency has been changed to {currency}
changed_language: Your language has been changed to {language}

error_purchased_item: Your NFT was not found! Please try again later!
sell_item_message: Your NFT is listed for sale at {sell_amount} {currency} Please wait for sales updates!
sell_item_success: Your NFT has been sold! The amount of {amount} {currency} has been added to your balance
sell_item_error: Your NFT was not sold! Please try again later or list it at a different price!
